goal.en: "This course provides an introduction to the basic knowledge and fundamental background of “Ultrafast Optics”, especially to those who have never heard about the term."
goal.ch: 本課程介紹超光學之基本知識，並對各領域之運用做說明。

content.en:
"Introduction
- definition for ultrafast optics
- Electromagnetism, laser operation, Fourier transform in optics
Principle of mode-locking
- Short pulse formation
- Time / frequency-domain treatment
Ultrafast pulse measurement
- Autocorrelation / cross-correlation measurement
- Frequency-Resolved optical gating
Ultrafast nonlinear optics
- Second-harmonics generation /three-wave interaction
- Nonlinear propagation / self-phase modulation / soliton
Manipulation of ultrashort pulse
- Pulse shaping technique
- Space-to-Time shaping
Selective topics
- Pump-probe measurement
- Frequency comb"
content.ch:
"1. 基本介紹
2. 鎖模原理
3. 超快脈衝量測
4. 超快非線性光學
5. 脈衝操作
6. 相關領域研究介紹"

textbook.en: "“Ultrafast Optics” Andrew Weiner, John Wiley & Sons, 2011."
textbook.ch: "“Ultrafast Optics” Andrew Weiner, John Wiley & Sons, 2011."

grading.ch: "作業 (4次) – 40% 期中考 I 30% 期末報告 – 30%"
